name: Lego Stunt Rally (2000)
description: Lego Stunt Rally is a Lego-themed isometric racing video game for Microsoft Windows and Game Boy Color. Developed by Intelligent Games for PC and Graphic State for Game Boy Color and published by Lego Media, the game features a track editor that allows players to build single-player and multiplayer tracks. A PlayStation version of the game in development at Asylum Entertainment, but eventually canceled shortly before release.
